profileChangeDesc: If your account is compromised, you can change your password here and reset your subscription link to prevent unnecessary losses.
profileChangeToast: Password changed successfully, please log in again
profileResetDesc: If your subscription address is compromised, you can reset your subscription information here to prevent unnecessary losses.
profileResetToast: Subscription link reset successfully, please re-import the subscription in your client
profileResetTitle: Are you sure you want to reset your subscription information?
profileResetContent: If your subscription address or information is compromised, you can perform this action. After resetting, your UUID and subscription will change, requiring re-import.
profileLogoutTitle: Do you want to log out?
profileLogoutContent: After logging out, you will be redirected to the login page. You will need to log in again to use our services.

heroDesc: {site} is a reliable, secure, efficient, and cost-effective internet access solution.
featuresDesc: We strive to provide you with the best service

1.title: Streaming Unlock
1.description: We support multiple streaming platforms including Netflix, YouTube, Disney+, etc., to enhance your viewing experience.

2.title: Dedicated Line Transmission
2.description: Our service uses the best dedicated lines to transmit your data, providing a smooth internet experience with minimal latency and maximum speed.

3.title: AI Platform Support
3.description: Our service supports most AI platforms, including ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini, etc., to improve your daily efficiency.

shopDesc: Choose a subscription that suits you for a faster, safer internet experience.
faqDesc: Can't find the answer you're looking for? Contact our customer support team.

1.question: How to contact customer service?
1.answer: You can contact our customer service team via our online chat feature.

2.question: How to cancel a subscription?
2.answer: You can cancel your subscription on your dashboard page.

3.question: How to change payment methods?
3.answer: You can change your payment method on your dashboard page.

4.question: How to view my order history?
4.answer: You can view your order history on your dashboard page.
